title: Service Portal administration
content:
You can use the Service Portal Settings module to design the look and feel of Service Portal.

For information on how to build rules to entitle different audiences to view areas of the portal, and different themes, see How to manage entitlement rules.

Note To work in the Service Portal Settings module, you must have the Service Portal Administrator role.
